page.title: 16Playground Games
page.content: *Jail Break* Firstly you pick equal sides of boys and girls. The boys have to chase the girls until they are all caught. When one is caught she is put into a pretend jail. The other girls have to try to touch the "prisoner" and release her. Once all the girls have been captured the game is over. *Chocolate Release* One person is chosen to be "up" and has to turn away from the others. The others have to move about. Suddenly the one who is "up" has to turn quickly round and try to catch somebody moving. If he does then the person who has been caught has to stand near to the person who is "up" but with his arms out. The "upper" then turns away again while the others have to try to touch the one who has been caught and shout "Chocolate Release" to free him without themselves being caught.
